summary: A documentary which refutes and debunks "facts" made by Michael Moore in his hit film Fahrenheit 9/11 (2004).
cast: Dick Morris|Zell Miller|Ed Koch|Ron Silver|Ann Coulter|Peter King|David Frum|Frank Gaffney|David Kopel|David Hardy|Jason Clarke|Peter Damon|Bill Sammon|Gwen Tose-Rigell|Ed Sapp|John Ashcroft|Osama bin Laden|George Bush|George W. Bush|Laura Bush|Jimmy Carter|Rosalynn Carter|James W. Cawley|Mike Cawley|Glenn Chastain|Steve Emerson|Vicente Fox|Logan Gregory|James Haddock|Julie Hanson|Saddam Hussein|Uday Hussein|William Kennard|John F. Kennedy|Andy Kenyon|Arthur Levitt|Paul MacNamara|Samantha Madsen|Thomas Mack McLarty|Ralph Nader|Ronald Reagan|Monty Smith|Britney Spears|Paul Wolfowitz|Bill Clinton|Al Gore|Michael Moore
title: Fahrenhype 9/11
